#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int t;
 
	// cout<<"enter the test cases";
	cin>>t;

	for (int m=0;m<t;m++)
	{
		int num;
		cin>>num;
		int sum = 0;
		for (int i=1;num/pow(5,i)>=1;i++)
		{
			int m = 1;
			while(m <= num/pow(5,i))
			{
				sum += pow(5,i)*m;
				m++;
			}
		}
		cout<<sum<<"\n";
    }
	return 0;
}
